metadata.title: CVE-2018-20374 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tiny C Compiler (aka TinyCC or TCC) 0.9.27. Compiling a crafted source file leads to an 8 byte out of bounds write in the use_section1 function in tccasm.c.

criterions.comment: tcc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
